turkish_example_sentence: Onlar bu ilginç sanat sergisini deneyeler ve sanat hakkında konuşsunlar.
english_example_sentence: May they try this interesting art exhibition and talk about art.
russian_example_sentence: Пусть они попробуют эту интересную художественную выставку и поговорят об искусстве.
